name: Lost Heroes Chapter 2 - Cocomong's playground
description:
"A short and bold Korean horror game"

The character came out of the maze, but what led to the exit was Cocomong's playground, finding another exit.

control:

WASD, arrow keys to move

E to Intraction, play tape

Find the playground exit

Don't get caught by Cocomong

Chapter 3? I don't know....

He is Cocomong ->
